de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.inputforms

Class InputFormRefereeDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.inputforms.AbstractInputFormController<Referee>
      • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.inputforms.InputFormRefereeDataController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInputFormController<Referee>

    public class InputFormRefereeDataController
extends AbstractInputFormController<Referee>

    Controller for the referee data edit dialog tab.
